input_text:
Job Title: Onsite Lifestyle Manager (ATX2024-6951)

Location: Aubrey, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
GrandManors is a Division of RealManage, a company that specializes in the management of community associations with onsite staff. Our mission is to provide the best possible lifestyle HOA management services to our partner communities by encompassing the Best People, Best Technology, and Best Service reputation of RealManage and its CiraConnect division. The GrandManors professional staff has decades of experience managing age-restricted communities, luxury high-rise condominiums, co-ops, urban mixed-use, and large-scale single-family developments with complex amenities. Our focus is on customer service and lifestyle for the residents and the boards we serve- ensuring that the community receives the finest management in the industry.

GrandManors is a values-based company with the following values as our guiding principles:

 Integrity: we always do the right thing.  Respect: for our customers, employees and company; mutual respect is the cornerstone for every GrandManors relationship.  Selflessness: more than teamwork; we are part of something special and much larger than any of us.  Personal Relationships: we are a professional services company; people do business with people they like.  Always Improving: never satisfied, always learning and always growing; one is either getting worse or getting better...never staying the same. At GrandManors, we are always getting better. 

Celebration is a community of over 4000 homes and 10,000 residents. There’s a reason Celebration is not a town, but a community in every positive sense of the word. While the population is diverse, the residents share a strong community spirit and a desire for a friendship with their neighbors. The community’s foundation is based on five cornerstones: Health, Education, Technology, Sense of Community and Sense of Place.

Responsibilities

Looking for a detail-oriented Lifestyles Manager to identify, coordinate and market all resident programs and events to include recreational, social, travel, cultural, educational and entertainment designed to enrich the quality-of-life residents of the community.

The Lifestyles Manager is primarily responsible for planning and executing small to large scale resident and community-wide events. Responsibilities encompass event coordination from planning to execution, marketing and promotions, & vendor and contract management.

 Supervision of other staff  Knowledge and understanding of the budget  Plan, coordinate and implement resident events and community-wide events.  Vendor management skills to ensure excellent vendor partnership and relationship building  Secure all entertainment, food, decorations and items necessary to carryout event/s  Social committee liaison soliciting input and involvement from residents by attending committee meetings  Assess overall success of event/s  Additional duties assigned by the Director of Lifestyle and Communications and the Executive Director. 

Qualifications

 Associates degree or higher  Flexible schedule  Qualified applicants are extremely client focused and will display the following:  Strong attention to detail,  Ability to problem solve,  Ability to maintain confidential information,  Strong written and verbal communication skills,  Strong time management skills,  Ability to work independently or with a group,  and ability to meet a high standard of customer service. 

 Pay and Benefits: 

$60,000 to $65,000, depending on education and experience.

 Benefits include: 

 Medical Insurance  Dental Insurance  Vision Insurance  Life and Disability Insurance  HSA (Required High Deductible Medical Plan to be eligible)  FSA  Education Reimbursement  401K matching  Employee Assistance Program (EAP)  9 paid Holidays

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Onsite Lifestyle Manager
output_json.summary: GrandManors is a Division of RealManage, specializing in community association management.
optional_skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work independently or with a group
ability to meet a high standard of customer service
job_responsibilities: Identify, coordinate, and market resident programs and events
Plan and execute small to large scale resident and community-wide events
Coordinate event planning from start to finish
Serve as liaison for social committee
benefits: HSA (Required High Deductible Medical Plan to be eligible)
output_json.company_information: GrandManors is a Division of RealManage, specializing in community association management.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Celebration is a values-based company with the following values as our guiding principles: Integrity, Respect, Selflessness, Personal Relationships, and Always Improving.
